properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 29 at 8:38AM EDT expiring October 29 at 9:30AM EDT by NWS Taunton MA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
East central Washington County in Rhode Island...
Southwestern Newport County in Rhode Island...

* Until 930 AM EDT.

* At 838 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Narragansett,
or near South Kingstown, moving northeast at 20 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines.

* Locations impacted include...
South Kingstown, North Kingstown, Newport, Portsmouth, Middletown,
Narragansett, Tiverton, Jamestown, Little Compton and Prudence
Island.
properties.instruction:
For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.

properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 29 at 8:32AM EDT by NWS Taunton MA
properties.description:
At 830 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7
miles north of Block Island, moving northeast at 40 mph.

This storm has exhibited rotation and there is some severe weather
threat and perhaps even a tornado threat. We continue to monitor
closely

Locations impacted include...
South Kingstown, North Kingstown, Newport, Middletown, Narragansett
and Jamestown.
properties.instruction:
Get indoors when this storm approaches. Winds may be strong enough to
produce minor damage, such as a few downed branches.

NWSheadline: THUNDERSTORM APPROACHING SOUTH COAST WITH SEVERE WEATHER POTENTIAL

properties.areaDesc: Nantucket; Washington; Newport; Southern Plymouth; Block Island; Dukes; Barnstable; Southern Bristol; Bristol
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 29 at 8:29AM EDT by NWS Taunton MA
properties.description:
Thunderstorms moving across the South Coast, Cape Cod, and the
Islands this morning may produce damaging winds and possibly a
tornado. Waterspouts are also possible on the coastal waters.

The threat of severe weather will come to an end around 11 AM.

Go inside at the first sign of threatening weather. Pay attention
for updated statements and possible warnings.

NWSheadline: SEVERE THUNDERSTORMS POSSIBLE NEAR THE SOUTH COAST THIS MORNING

title: Current watches, warnings, and advisories for Rhode Island
